name: Fax Cover Page File
summary: Learn about .COV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: COV files can be hosted on internal company servers using Fax Service Manager. Hosted cover pages may be made available to employees so that company faxes have a standardized format.

description: File created by Microsoft Fax Cover Page Editor, a fax program included with Windows Business, Ultimate, and Enterprise editions; saves the page layout structure, text, and graphics for a fax cover page; often contains company logos, the company name, and the sender's address; used for fax transmissions.
